ygData.subject: Enchanting items
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as enchanting items, we won t know until we see it.  They had some Enchantment of brilliance spells which were supposed to make the item give off light.
ygData.messageBody:
As far as enchanting items, we won't know until we see it. They had some
Enchantment of brilliance spells which were supposed to make the item give
off light. I'd like to see a level 8 or level 12 spell which temporarily
makes a weapon able to hit magical creatures. We have a damage shield spell
(Feedback) so I doubt if that would be an enchantment (unless it was lower
level). Any old school D&D players remember the spell "Permanence"? Make
that a level 44 or 49 spell so our temporary weapon enchantments would last
forever. It would be neat to make a sword flame temporarily and give extra
damage. I wonder if we'd have to hold the weapon as we cast the spell. All
we know now is that it will be done, but I honestly have no clue what will
actually be implemented.

-Krye
